messages.content: I live in Lisbon, Alfama.
That's a beautiful area! How do you like living there?
I have a pastel de nata at the corner bakery every morning.
Sounds delicious! Do you have a favorite flavor?
I enjoy watching the sunset from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte.
What a stunning view that must be! Do you go there often?
Yes, it's my favorite part of the day.
That sounds lovely!
I live near Castelo de São Jorge.
That's a great landmark to be close to!
My neighbor Maria teaches me Portuguese slang.
That's awesome! Learning slang can be really fun.
We often chat about local culture.
Sounds like a great way to improve your language skills!
I owe her a coffee for all her help.
That's a nice gesture! What kind of coffee do you like?
I love a good espresso.
Perfect choice!
I also enjoy the pastel de nata from that bakery.
Those pastries are a must-try!
My morning routine includes a pastel de nata at the corner bakery.
That sounds like a tasty way to start the day!
After that, I usually go for a walk around Alfama.
Alfama is such a charming place to explore.
I often end my day watching the sunset from Miradouro da Senhora do Monte.
That sounds like a beautiful way to unwind.
I also live near Castelo de São Jorge.
What a fantastic location! Do you visit the castle often?
Not as often as I should, but it's nice to have it nearby.
Absolutely! It's nice to have such history close to home.

queries.question: What do you have every morning at the bakery?

reference_answer.text: I have a pastel de nata at the corner bakery every morning.
